name: Cricetz
description:
Your goal to collect 10 crystals and escape. Any wish come true once crystals collected.

But something dangerous guarding crystals, slowly lurking in the dark...

//=== About game ===//

This is my first game. It's short, but challenging. 
Heart attack warning(!), please be carefull if you have heart diseases.
Update #1(May 6): Easy mode added(press "R" to use radar with 10s cooldown)

//=== About creator ===//

I'm single, introverted, and live with my mother(she can't work due to health problems).
For now i work remotely on low paid/unreliable part time job. As a last resort i will have to search for full time job soon, but i don't want to risk with possibilty to transmit infection to mother, without her i will lose meaning of my life. I really don't know what to do right now.

I have a dream to became game developer, and sustain myself and my mother.
Please support me if you can, any dollar will help, thank you.
